title: [QUESTION] Build on FreeBSD
body:
Hi guys, I'm trying to build libSkiaSharp for FreeBSD, but I hit a roadblock. Had to modify a check in the DNG SDK to make it build, but I'm getting strange errors when the static archives are linked:

`ar: warning: can't open file: @libzlib_x86.a.rsp: No such file or directory`

The end result is unusable as the archive is basically empty, I'm guessing there's an issue with BSD's `ar`. I have yet to try `llvm-ar`, but if you have any pointers that would be great.
